testimonialsData.quote: "Valora Prime transformed how I set my rates. Now, I feel confident about my pricing!"
testimonialsData.author: Alex, Freelance Designer

testimonialsData.quote: "A must-have for any freelancer. My finances have never been this organized."
testimonialsData.author: Sam, Developer

testimonialsData.quote: "Thanks to this site, I was able to calculate how much to charge for my services fairly and accurately. I just entered my expenses and my work availability, and got the exact value per hour and per month. It's an essential tool for any freelancer!"
testimonialsData.author: Jorge, Developer
